member.name: M:GerberVS.Gerber.ParseGerber(System.String)
member.summary: Process the Gerber file.
member.param: full path and file name of the gerber file
member.remarks: This is a wrapper which gets called from top level. It does some initialization and pre-processing, and then calls GerberParseFileSegment method which processes the actual file. Then it does final modifications to the image created.
